scripts.build-firebase-todo: cd firebase-todo && bower update && npm run build
scripts.build-followbox: cd followbox && bower update && npm run build
scripts.build-game: cd game && bower update && npm run build
scripts.build-timebomb: cd timebomb && bower update && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build-firebase-todo && npm run build-followbox && npm run build-game 6& npm run build-timebomb
